name: 李老师不是你老师
content: That night, Ho Kit-yung wrote a long article to express his anger and confusion about Messi's playing in Japan. He accused him of violating sports ethics and breaking the hearts of 40,000 fans in Hong Kong. He also questioned why Beckham promoted the news of the team's visit to Hong Kong but left during the Japan stop. His remarks received a lot of support from netizens on Weibo, but were criticized by netizens in the IG comment area.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At 8 pm on February 7, Beijing Railway Station.
The interception personnel of the township government of Linghai City, Liaoning Province, were rescued by the police at the railway station when they tried to snatch the daughter and luggage of a petitioner. Then the five interception personnel left in disgrace.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Fujian Ningde Tourism released a video promoting tourism, but citizens in the comment section complained about the high prices in Ningde.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 6, Tianshui, Gansu. The Tianbao Mingdu project owed workers wages, and workers gathered at the construction site to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 6, in Puyang, Henan, China Construction Fifth Engineering Bureau owed migrant workers two years of wages, and the workers gathered in the office of the construction site leader to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 6, in Linyi, Shandong, workers gathered outside the developer of Jindun Huafu and held up banners to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 6, Shandong. Luxi Mining Guotun Coal Mine owed workers wages, and workers held banners outside the company to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, the Korean Central News Agency reported that the Supreme People's Assembly of North Korea decided to abolish all economic cooperation agreements with South Korea.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
I don't know where the money went, but we are also going to start delaying the workers' wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 7, local time, at Northwestern University in the United States, international students commemorated Li Wenliang on the Freedom Graffiti Stone.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, the Global Times published an article commenting on the Messi incident: "There is a saying that this action is politically motivated, that Hong Kong intends to create an event economy, and that some external forces deliberately want to embarrass Hong Kong."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, the Messi Hong Kong incident escalated again. There are reports that the Chinese Football Association has deleted all news related to Messi and suspended cooperation with the Argentine Football Association.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Just now, CCTV reported that Xi Jinping had a phone call with Putin.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the recent broadcast of the program "This is China", Gao Shiming, president of the China Academy of Art, mentioned that pandas belong to China, but what is "Kung Fu Panda"? It is essentially a black teenager on the streets of San Francisco. He uses your image, symbols, and resources to make money from you, but the values behind it are the story of an American teenager growing up. Behind this is a cultural "Trojan Horse" that we need to pay attention to.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, the two topics about "The Chinese Football Association has deleted all news related to Messi" have successively ranked in the top five hot searches and have been widely reported by the media, but some netizens said that this may be a false news.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Global People, a magazine under the People's Daily, commented: "Messi's contempt and even hostility towards Chinese fans has been exposed."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 7, workers who went to Egypt submitted an article.
Due to wage arrears, Chinese workers in the Belt and Road Egypt CBD project collectively demanded wages and were beaten by security guards sent by the Third Branch of China Construction First Engineering Bureau.
According to the contributor, there are about 3,000 Chinese workers in Egypt. With the delay of the project construction cycle and other issues, this year's wages have not been paid, and the project may still be at risk of being unfinished.
After the workers were beaten, the wages owed have been paid in full, and the troublemakers will be sent back to China another day.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 7, Heze, Shandong. Heze Municipal Hospital owed workers wages, so workers stood on the roof of the hospital and jumped off the building to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 8, Urumqi, Xinjiang. Tonghang Logistics Industrial Park and Fuyangju Labor Service Company owed wages to migrant workers from other places, and the workers demanded their wages.
A worker cried to the police, "You have elderly parents and young children to take care of, and people are kind-hearted. Can't you think of such a thing? We just want the wages of a migrant worker."
The police at the scene bowed their heads and said nothing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 7, Xi'an, Shaanxi. Zhongnan Junqi owed workers wages, and the workers knelt down to the boss in tears as the New Year was approaching without paying them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 8, a public account published a poll report of the Guangzhou Social Situation and Public Opinion Research Center in 2023, showing that the all-round satisfaction of Guangzhou polls has not been seen in more than 30 years.
Conclusion 1: After a sharp decline in 2022, satisfaction with economic conditions continued to bottom out and fell to the level of 2015
Conclusion 2: Employment and income evaluation continued to decline
Conclusion 3: Dissatisfaction among low-income, low-educated people and young people is prominent
Conclusion 4: Satisfaction with "private enterprise development" hit a record low
Conclusion 5: Most citizens expect that their income will not improve, and private enterprises lack confidence in economic development in 2024
Conclusion of the poll center:
There are problems in the field of people's livelihood;
There are problems in the field of people's livelihood, and the root cause is that there are problems with the people's "purses";
There are problems with the people's "purses", and the source can be traced back to the various difficulties currently faced by private enterprises.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, CCTV host Yang Rui revealed that his pension was only 3,679 yuan, and tagged Sima Nan for help.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the eve of New Year's Eve, netizens visited the area around the Shenzhen Sanhe Longhua Talent Market and found that many people were still sleeping outdoors.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: This article has been blocked
